title: T206 graded card sale - from Cobb/Wajo to commons
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: T206 graded card sale - from Cobb/Wajo to commons
posts.post_content:
I have a very large number of graded T206s for sale.  Have graded big stars, HOF, HOF with backs, commons with backs, and commons.

For organization and ease of scans, they are all listed here on my ebay: [url]https://www.ebay.com/sch/m.html?_ssn=vettejayk123&amp%3B_sop=16&_sop=16[/url]

ALWAYS assume that any fee savings are passed to the buyer.  So if you're paying FF assume at least 13% savings on ebay price.  If you're paying goods assume at least 10% savings on ebay price.

Email to [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url] if you'd like any or to discuss a larger buy.
